title: Le francais, tout simplement! (gnv64)
description: Le francais, tout simplement! By Jean-Pierre Colin Eyrolles | February 2010 | ISBN-10: 2212545266 | PDF | 388 pages | 47.7 mb http://www.eyrolles.com/Loisirs/Livre/le-francais-tout-simplement-9782212545265 This step-by-step guide proposes a living pedagogy to master the basics of the French language and to avoid the most common mistakes. It is based on a progressive course of 10 days, each supplementing the contributions of the previous one in the fields of grammar, conjugation, spelling and vocabulary. Complete, it provides many tools to help the reader retain the rules and put them into practice: Historical anecdotes. Literary examples. Playful exercises. Jean-Pierre Colin has been Director of Studies in several distance learning organizations. He is already the author of French training books and teaching materials.
